comment: A man in a green shirt and red life jacket is sitting in a canoe drifting around the lake .
Several men are sitting by a river conversing with one another while a boat drifts by them .
A group of fishermen on a boat tied up in a bay , with piles of driftwood near them .
Young boy drifting in small canoe on a calm blue river .
A dog is drifting on a lake in a small boat .
Small child in knit hat and coat holds a snow shovel in a snowdrift .
The dog sits by a snowdrift .
Two people drift in a small boat on a foggy lake with trees in the background .
Two girls wearing hats are running through snow drifts outside .
A snowboarder flying off a snow drift with a colorful sky in the background .
The black dog leaps a pile of driftwood as he runs the beach .
People on a brown-sand beach are holding a drift net used for fishing .
A brown squirrel is jumping over a snow drift .
A yellow car is drifting through snow .
A group of people are standing on a raft as it drifts down a river .
A group of women wearing all white with their mid-drift 's showing .
A crowd walks about a square at night with smoke or fog drifting over them .
A dog walking along a snow drift .
Two drifters and their dog sleeping at a historic location .
Two women are dancing with their mid-drifts bare .
A man who appears to be homeless or a drifter .
A man collecting driftwood along side a body of water .
Woman lying face down on a white mat in a round with a stone floor as sunlight streams in the window onto the driftwood in the background .
There are two cars drifting on a track as spectators watch above .
A rally car drifts around a turn and splashes mud .
A skier jumps a snowdrift high in the trees .
A driver is drifting the back of his car , making a cloud of dirt behind him .
Motocross riders drift around a bend .
A car drifting in the desert .
A woman walking across an old rope and driftrood bridge between mountains .
